post.body: shit.. i lost an unsaved awesome grafic design... stepped on the computer's switch off button... fffkgoddamnittt. SAVE UR WORKS ALWAYS
drawing ... drawing.. designing... designing... watching... looking... observing... inspired...infinitely... and drawing designing again...
i am drawing after work in my room... i will draw and complete it...i am loving what is coming out ...
woo... 5 degrees and going down.omffg. Random thought: Don't expect your dog to watch your own food... :D
Trying to cope with the winters here in Chandigarh... the temperatures are dropping below 10 and as of now it is 16C ... lovvvvin it... omgg
Some days there are certain things that I can not enter in twitter...
I can not stop myself being fascinated at artworks and expressiveness of people around the world and remain mindfawwkdd... .. as usual ^_^
m feeling a lot happier today.don't know why. ^_^ ...n that gives me a lot of energy to explore life n work more than the usual.^__^
At work - Digital drawings/web design/graphic design etc., After Work - Reading and researching notes for the next drawing and sleep.
At work doing digital artworks for the company and reading stuff to do the notes for my next drawing after work...
